# R (In Class Exercise)

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, tidyverse, terra, gstat, viridis)
```

```{r}
rfstations <- read_csv("data/aspatial/RainfallStation.csv")
```

```{r}
rfdata <- read_csv("data/aspatial/DAILYDATA_202402.csv") %>%
  select(c(1, 5)) %>%
  group_by(Station) %>%
  summarise(MONTHSUM = sum(`Daily Rainfall Total (mm)`)) %>%
  ungroup()

```

```{r}
rfdata <- rfdata %>%
  left_join(rfstations)
```

```{r}
rfdata_sf <- st_as_sf(rfdata, 
                      coords = c("Longitude",
                                 "Latitude"),
                      crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414)
```

```{r}
mpsz2019 <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",
                    layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3141)
```

```{r}
tmap_options(check.and.fix = TRUE)
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(mpsz2019) +
  tm_borders() +
tm_shape(rfdata_sf) +
  tm_dots(col = "MONTHSUM")
tmap_mode("plot")

```

```{r}
grid <- terra::rast(mpsz2019,
                    nrows = 690,
                    ncols = 1075)

xy <- terra::xyFromCell(grid,
                        1:ncell(grid))
```
